Value: EROAD Limited provides electronic on-board units and software as a service to the transport industry in New Zealand and internationally. The company offers products to reduce the time and money spend on road user charges compliance; and manage obligations and risks associated with the Health and Safety at Work Act, as well as fleet management products. It also designs and manufactures in-vehicle hardware; and operates secure payment and merchant gateways, as well as provides web-based value-added services. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.
